entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
